Package com.intellij.formatting

Interface BlockEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Block
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataLanguageBlockWrapper, InjectedLanguageBlockWrapper, TemplateLanguageBlock

    public interface BlockEx
extends Block
    Marker interface defining that code style settings for language returned by #getLanguage should be used when formatting block implementing this interface. E.g you have injected code which should be formatted accordingly to it's own language
